name: expressjs-field-validator
description: Plugin for validating field values of json request in expressjs

scripts.minify: node-minify --compressor uglify-es --input './lib/validator/validator.js' --output './lib/validator/index.js' && node-minify --compressor uglify-es --input './lib/checkService/checkService.js' --output './lib/checkService/index.js' && node-minify --compressor uglify-es --input './lib/skipService/skipService.js' --output './lib/skipService/index.js' && node-minify --compressor uglify-es --input 'index.js' --output 'index.js'

author: Midhun G S
